response.overview: As a violent militia, led by Badger (Gloria Lusiak) a beautiful yet sadistic woman, prepares to blow up a huge government building three gorgeous women are accidentally captured. the militia happily takes them back to the militia compound and uses them as human prey for military maneuvers. Unbeknownst to the militia though, these women are not government secretaries but highly trained FBI agents, and when the women discover the plot to destroy the building they must race against time as they attempt to escape the militia and save the hundreds of lives that occupy the building.
response.title: Urban Combat
